main event: On October 7, 1956, in Newington, Connecticut, a very bright, fluorescent-type object shaped like a football was observed hovering and rotating in the sky before suddenly taking off at a high rate of speed and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 500 feet in the air and about 1/2 mile away.
It appeared to be silvery in color and giving off a fluorescent glow.
The object was observed for about 2 minutes before abruptly taking off to the southwest and disappearing.
The witness reported the incident to the State Police in Hartford, Connecticut.
The report specifies that there was 1 photo associated with the incident.
sighted object: fluorescent-type object shaped like a football
